name: Maximum Security Block
content: The Maximum Security Block punishment for children.

name: Girls' Unit
content: Villa78  - the Girls's Unit held up to 30 children.

name: Boys' Unit
content: Villa 8  - the Boy's Unit held up to 30 children.

name: Eleven Bed Villas
content: Villas 9 - 18: these units were originally intended as small, dedicated group therapy units. The first group of children at Lake Alice were held here prior to being moved to the larger x bed facilities.

name: Disturbed Patients' Villa
content: Villa 14 - adult patients with serious psychiatric issues held in close proximity to children.
